title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When selecting "Add Javadoc" from the context menu of a field in TH, nothing happens. The expected behavior is either that this menu should be removed or, preferably, the action should add the Javadoc for the field.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open TH. 2. Right-click on a field. 3. Select "Add Javadoc" from the context menu. 4. Observe that nothing happens.
